DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Observation Performed Study Activity Display Order ISO21090.INT.NONNEG.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The sequence or position of a component in a list of question or data items.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Observation Performed Study Activity Display Order
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._Exhibit, present, or demonstrate for viewing.:A logical or comprehensible arrangement of separate elements.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Observation Performed Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Exhibit, present, or demonstrate for viewing.:A logical or comprehensible arrangement of separate elements.

Concepts.definition: Exhibit, present, or demonstrate for viewing.
A logical or comprehensible arrangement of separate elements; a condition of regular or proper arrangement.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains INT to a value of 0 or greater.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
